pr_title: #2133 @BeanMapping#resultType should not be applied to forged methods

timeline.bodyText: This makes sense. However, doesn't it make more sense to construct the appropriate MappingMethodOptions when we create a new ForgedMethod instead?
timeline.author: filiphr

replies.bodyText:
I (of course 😄 looked on that option). But

Its too much hassle
There might be actually a reason to carry down all options through the underlying forged methods.. You just have to be careful to use them and check whether they are really applicable
replies.author: sjaakd

replies.bodyText: We had it like that some refactorings ago..
